name: s3cld
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: cats1cld(cs3(c0, c1, c2), c3, cs2(c0, c1), c2, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(c3)))
-| wceq(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(cs2(c0, c1), cconcat, cs1(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(c3)))
-| wceq(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(cs2(c0, c1), cconcat, cs1(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))

body.origin: |- wceq(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(cs2(c0, c1), cconcat, cs1(c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))

comment: A length 3 string is a word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2016.)
